topic.title: A request for features like blacklist and Reputation Ranking.
topic.body:
For anyone who creates a zite or two in the zeronet, some self-protecting measures shall be available, like "filtering bad users" or "rogue zites exploiting some 0day vulnerabilities", these functions shall be controlled totally by the users who want to block something all for themselves. No censorship doesn't mean you give up your own choice and protection, plus th ability to do.

I got this idea from the following post:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_1BFTNXtYQDMCurqyg45KLmsV6oJD7bQSsH/We+need+a+reputation+system

Here, by "filtering bad users", I means those spammers backed up by rogue goverments, such as communist totalitarian goverment in China, islamic totalitarian regimes in the middle east, neo-authoritarian dictatorship like PUTLER in Russia, and neo-totalitarian dictatorship like House Kim in North Korea.

These well-funded locusts can eat an individual dissendant's blogzite within minutes, even by purely manual spammings, deep web or not. That's why a blacklist function for any individual zite is so important, which can stop some evil agents immediately if the victim wants to do so. The blacklist can also work for the users who don't want to access certain zites.

I think Filtering by keys shall be enough for the blacklist to function from the start.

In case those spammers flood the zeroID service to obtain new IDs infinitely, there shall be a rule to dump those useless IDs purely registered for evil purpose. Maybe based on a time span of no activity? Or some reputation ranking system? Say, once a spammer be flagged as "rogue", by a number of individual sites, then it is automatically wiped for good from zeroID.

The reputatioin ranking and blacklist are critically essential functions for dissendants and those anti-authoritarian types. And most importantly, anyone in zeronet shall not be defenseless.
